qa_pairs.question: What are the key professional roles and affiliations that Sunil Kanoria has held, and how do they reflect his influence in both business and public sectors?
qa_pairs.answer: <statement>Sunil Kanoria is a Kolkata-based Indian businessman and the co-founder of Srei Infrastructure Finance, which has established itself as a major infrastructure equipment finance company in India with a market share of over 30%.<cite>[S2][S10][S12][S13]</cite></statement> <statement>He has served as the president of ASSOCHAM and as the Honorary Consul of Spain in Kolkata, reflecting his influence in business advocacy and international diplomatic relations.<cite>[S3]</cite></statement> <statement>Kanoria held the position of a Member in the Construction Sector during the tenth Five-Year Plan as part of the Government of India’s Planning Commission, highlighting his role in shaping national infrastructure policies.<cite>[S4]</cite></statement> <statement>He served as a Council Member at the Institute of Chartered Accountants of India, underscoring his contributions to professional accounting standards and governance.<cite>[S5]</cite></statement> <statement>Additionally, he was the former President of the Agri Horticultural Society of India, indicating his engagement in agricultural and horticultural development initiatives.<cite>[S6]</cite></statement> <statement>Kanoria played a key role in establishing strategic joint ventures, such as a 50:50 partnership with BNP Paribas for infrastructure financing and a collaboration with Tata Teleservices to form Viom Networks, demonstrating his impact on India’s telecom and infrastructure sectors.<cite>[S14][S15]</cite></statement>
qa_pairs.chunk:
Passage 1:
[S1] Sunil Kanoria


# Sunil Kanoria



**Sunil Kanoria** is a Kolkata-based Indian businessman. [S2] He was the co-founder of Srei Infrastructure Finance. [S3] He has served as the president of ASSOCHAM and as the Honorary Consul of Spain in Kolkata. [S4] He has held the position of a Member in the Construction Sector during the tenth Five-Year Plan as part of the Planning Commission within the Government of India. [S5] In a nomination by the Government of India, he served as a Council Member at the Institute of Chartered Accountants of India. [S6] He is the former President of the Agri Horticultural Society of India. [S7] ## Personal life

Sunil Kanoria was born on May 4, 1965,ᶜⁱᵗᵃᵗⁱᵒⁿ ⁿᵉᵉᵈᵉᵈ in Kolkata, India, into a Marwari Hindu family. [S8] He is the son of Hari Prasad Kanoria and Champa Devi Kanoria and is the third of five siblings. [S9] ## Career

Sunil co-founded Srei Infrastructure Finance Ltd. [S10] in 1989, in collaboration with his brother Hemant Kanoria. [S11] According to The Hindu report, Srei Infrastructure Finance Ltd. [S12] has established itself as an infrastructure equipment finance company in India, holding a market share of over 30% over the years. [S13] In 2007 had a key role in establishing a 50:50 joint venture with BNP Paribas, focusing on the leasing and financing of infrastructure equipment and projects. [S14] Additionally, in 2009, he formed a joint venture with Tata Teleservices, resulting in the formation of Viom Networks, a telecom tower company. [S15] Subsequently, in 2016, Srei's stake in Viom Networks was acquired by the American Tower Corporation. [S16] ## Philanthropic

Sunil has been instrumental in founding the Kanoria foundation, dedicated to child education, women's empowerment, and spirituality. [S17] The foundation supports education from nursery to higher levels, focusing on sustainable environments, moral values, violence prevention, and skill development. [S18] The Suryodaya Schools, a core initiative, provide underprivileged children with comprehensive education and vocational training. [S19] The foundation also aids acid attack survivors through collaboration with Acid Survivors and Women Welfare Foundation. [S20] The Kanoria Foundation organizes global events known as "Confluences" dedicated to addressing essential themes such as Humanity, Power, and Spirituality. [S21] Since its inception in 2009, the Foundation has hosted 13 of these gatherings.
chunk_list:
[S1] Sunil Kanoria


# Sunil Kanoria



**Sunil Kanoria** is a Kolkata-based Indian businessman. [S2] He was the co-founder of Srei Infrastructure Finance. [S3] He has served as the president of ASSOCHAM and as the Honorary Consul of Spain in Kolkata. [S4] He has held the position of a Member in the Construction Sector during the tenth Five-Year Plan as part of the Planning Commission within the Government of India. [S5] In a nomination by the Government of India, he served as a Council Member at the Institute of Chartered Accountants of India. [S6] He is the former President of the Agri Horticultural Society of India. [S7] ## Personal life

Sunil Kanoria was born on May 4, 1965,ᶜⁱᵗᵃᵗⁱᵒⁿ ⁿᵉᵉᵈᵉᵈ in Kolkata, India, into a Marwari Hindu family. [S8] He is the son of Hari Prasad Kanoria and Champa Devi Kanoria and is the third of five siblings. [S9] ## Career

Sunil co-founded Srei Infrastructure Finance Ltd. [S10] in 1989, in collaboration with his brother Hemant Kanoria. [S11] According to The Hindu report, Srei Infrastructure Finance Ltd. [S12] has established itself as an infrastructure equipment finance company in India, holding a market share of over 30% over the years. [S13] In 2007 had a key role in establishing a 50:50 joint venture with BNP Paribas, focusing on the leasing and financing of infrastructure equipment and projects. [S14] Additionally, in 2009, he formed a joint venture with Tata Teleservices, resulting in the formation of Viom Networks, a telecom tower company. [S15] Subsequently, in 2016, Srei's stake in Viom Networks was acquired by the American Tower Corporation. [S16] ## Philanthropic

Sunil has been instrumental in founding the Kanoria foundation, dedicated to child education, women's empowerment, and spirituality. [S17] The foundation supports education from nursery to higher levels, focusing on sustainable environments, moral values, violence prevention, and skill development. [S18] The Suryodaya Schools, a core initiative, provide underprivileged children with comprehensive education and vocational training. [S19] The foundation also aids acid attack survivors through collaboration with Acid Survivors and Women Welfare Foundation. [S20] The Kanoria Foundation organizes global events known as "Confluences" dedicated to addressing essential themes such as Humanity, Power, and Spirituality. [S21] Since its inception in 2009, the Foundation has hosted 13 of these gatherings.

Okay, let's tackle this question. The user is asking about Sunil Kanoria's key professional roles and affiliations and how they reflect his influence in business and public sectors.

First, I need to go through the supporting context provided. The passage has several sentences numbered from S1 to S21. I'll need to identify which sentences mention his roles and affiliations.

- S2 mentions he was co-founder of Srei Infrastructure Finance. That's a business role.
- S3 says he was president of ASSOCHAM and Honorary Consul of Spain in Kolkata. ASSOCHAM is a business association, so that's a professional role. Honorary Consul is a public sector position.
- S4 mentions he was a Member in the Construction Sector during the tenth Five-Year Plan as part of the Planning Commission. That's a government role, public sector.
- S5 states he was a Council Member at the Institute of Chartered Accountants of India. That's a professional body, so business or accounting sector.
- S6 says he's former President of the Agri Horticultural Society of India. That's a professional affiliation.
- S10 and S11 talk about co-founding Srei Infrastructure Finance again, which is business.
- S14 and S15 mention establishing joint ventures with BNP Paribas and Tata Teleservices, which are business ventures.
- S16 mentions Srei's stake being acquired by American Tower Corporation, showing his business influence.

Now, the question also asks how these roles reflect his influence in both sectors. The business roles include co-founding companies, joint ventures, and positions in professional bodies. The public sector roles are the Planning Commission membership and the Honorary Consul position. His philanthropy (S17-S21) might also show public influence, but the question specifically asks about professional roles and affiliations, so maybe focus on the professional ones.

I need to structure the answer with each role and the corresponding citations. Each sentence in the answer should have the relevant citations. For example, co-founder of Srei is S2 and S10. But since S2 and S10 are different sentences, maybe list both. Wait, the user wants each sentence in the answer to have citations. So if a sentence combines multiple points, cite all relevant sources.

Also, check if any sentences are repeated. For instance, S2 and S10 both mention co-founding Srei. So if I mention that in one sentence, I should cite both S2 and S10.

Let me list out the key roles:

1. Co-founder of Srei Infrastructure Finance (S2, S10)
2. President of ASSOCHAM (S3)
3. Honorary Consul of Spain in Kolkata (S3)
4. Member in the Construction Sector during the tenth Five-Year Plan (S4)
5. Council Member at ICAI (S5)
6. Former President of Agri Horticultural Society (S6)
7. Key role in establishing joint ventures (S14, S15)

Then, the influence: business through founding companies, joint ventures, professional bodies; public through government roles and consular position.

Now, structure the answer with each statement and citations. Make sure each statement is a separate <statement> tag with appropriate citations.

[S21] Since its inception in 2009, the Foundation has hosted 13 of these gatherings.

qa_pairs.question: What is the significance of Srei Infrastructure Finance Ltd.'s market share and its joint ventures, according to the source?
qa_pairs.answer: <statement>Srei Infrastructure Finance Ltd. has established itself as an infrastructure equipment finance company in India, holding a market share of over 30% over the years.<cite>[S12][S13]</cite></statement> <statement>The company's joint ventures, such as the 50:50 partnership with BNP Paribas in 2007 and the 2009 collaboration with Tata Teleservices to form Viom Networks, highlight its strategic expansions in leasing, financing, and telecom infrastructure.<cite>[S14][S15]</cite></statement>
qa_pairs.chunk:
Passage 1:
[S1] Sunil Kanoria


# Sunil Kanoria



**Sunil Kanoria** is a Kolkata-based Indian businessman. [S2] He was the co-founder of Srei Infrastructure Finance. [S3] He has served as the president of ASSOCHAM and as the Honorary Consul of Spain in Kolkata. [S4] He has held the position of a Member in the Construction Sector during the tenth Five-Year Plan as part of the Planning Commission within the Government of India. [S5] In a nomination by the Government of India, he served as a Council Member at the Institute of Chartered Accountants of India. [S6] He is the former President of the Agri Horticultural Society of India. [S7] ## Personal life

Sunil Kanoria was born on May 4, 1965,ᶜⁱᵗᵃᵗⁱᵒⁿ ⁿᵉᵉᵈᵉᵈ in Kolkata, India, into a Marwari Hindu family. [S8] He is the son of Hari Prasad Kanoria and Champa Devi Kanoria and is the third of five siblings. [S9] ## Career

Sunil co-founded Srei Infrastructure Finance Ltd. [S10] in 1989, in collaboration with his brother Hemant Kanoria. [S11] According to The Hindu report, Srei Infrastructure Finance Ltd. [S12] has established itself as an infrastructure equipment finance company in India, holding a market share of over 30% over the years. [S13] In 2007 had a key role in establishing a 50:50 joint venture with BNP Paribas, focusing on the leasing and financing of infrastructure equipment and projects. [S14] Additionally, in 2009, he formed a joint venture with Tata Teleservices, resulting in the formation of Viom Networks, a telecom tower company. [S15] Subsequently, in 2016, Srei's stake in Viom Networks was acquired by the American Tower Corporation. [S16] ## Philanthropic

Sunil has been instrumental in founding the Kanoria foundation, dedicated to child education, women's empowerment, and spirituality. [S17] The foundation supports education from nursery to higher levels, focusing on sustainable environments, moral values, violence prevention, and skill development. [S18] The Suryodaya Schools, a core initiative, provide underprivileged children with comprehensive education and vocational training. [S19] The foundation also aids acid attack survivors through collaboration with Acid Survivors and Women Welfare Foundation. [S20] The Kanoria Foundation organizes global events known as "Confluences" dedicated to addressing essential themes such as Humanity, Power, and Spirituality. [S21] Since its inception in 2009, the Foundation has hosted 13 of these gatherings.
